member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Framework.Controllers.Generated.ACheckGetRecordController.AptifyGeneratedEntryMethod_CheckGetRecord_DefaultRoute(System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns a simple json structure with the url path and query parameters for the real location of this record. Used internally by Aptify to determine if the client cache can be used for record access. The optional query parameter ds indicates the timestamp of the version the client already has.
member.param: Either the entity name or entity id
The record id for the entity
optional query string parameter representing the timestamp version the client currently has. Indicates that the client wants the current record version returned
